name: EggAlarm
0:
”Alexa, open Egg Alarm”
”Set a time for a medium boiled egg”
”Make a soft boiled egg”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: egg alarm
des:
"An egg is always an adventure; it may be different each time" - Oscar Wilde

Do you have problems boiling your eggs? Are your egg whites too runny? Do you loose track of time and boil your eggs into unsavoury pebbles? Fret not! Whether you like your eggs hard, medium or soft boiled, this skill has got it all! Simply preboil a pot of water, place your eggs inside, and tell Egg Alarm how you like them. Egg Alarm will keep track of time and alert you with the crow of a rooster once your egg is done. 

*** Make sure to not ask Alexa any more questions after you start Egg Alarm. She might close the skill together with the timer. ***

Bon Appétit!

Please come back after your meal and leave an awesome review!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
